plot: At the peak of I-80's storm-driven Donner Pass, a band of tough operators rescue stranded and wrecked motorist who lose their way. These tow truck drivers risk it all to put food on the table and provide for their loved ones.
plot_en: At the peak of I-80's storm-driven Donner Pass, a band of tough operators rescue stranded and wrecked motorist who lose their way. These tow truck drivers risk it all to put food on the table and provide for their loved ones.
plot_es: At the peak of I-80's storm-driven Donner Pass, a band of tough operators rescue stranded and wrecked motorist who lose their way. These tow truck drivers risk it all to put food on the table and provide for their loved ones.
title: Hell on the Highway
